refnamediv.refpurpose: Echoes a message to the current loggers and listeners which means standard out unless overridden.

refentry.refsect1:
&ref.title.example;
<echo msg="Phing rocks!" />
<echo message="Binarycloud, too." />
<echo>And don't forget Propel.</echo>
<echo file="test.txt" append="false">This is a test message</echo>
